Bob Haugen wrote:
> 
> Is there a RESTful way to handle this situation?
> 

Why bother?  Set up a marketplace on NetSuite and let their Web Service
handle all those issues you point out, charge merchants for stallage.
Granted, a REST API to NetSuite would be nice.  Trying to model that on
rest-discuss, presuming nobody loses interest in the project, could
take years!  ;-)

-Eric
